Package Steganography.Logic

Class GifSteganography

  • java.lang.Object
    • Steganography.Logic.BaseSteganography
      • Steganography.Logic.GifSteganography

  • public class GifSteganography
extends BaseSteganography
    The GifSteganography class handles the steganographic process for GIF89a images using the Least Significant Bit (LSB) method.

    Due to the limited Colormap of each pixel in a gif (255 colors instead of 16 million colors), each byte is hidden inside the LSB of 8 consecutive pixels.

    The gif steganography process is optimized for hiding small data, as large data can heavily alter the gif stego image.

    See Also:
    GifSequenceWriter, Metadata

      void decode​(java.io.File file)
      Extracts the header from the stego image to create the BaseSteganography.secretInfo field, then decodes the hidden data in the image using revealByte(), then saves the secret file.

      Embeds one bit into the least significant bit of a pixel.

                 throws CannotDecodeException

      • writeHeader

        private void writeHeader​(byte[] header)
        Writes the data contained in a byte array (or BaseSteganography.header) to the first pixels of the image.
        Parameters:

        See Also:

      • encode

        public void encode​(byte[] message,
                   java.io.File output)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   CannotEncodeException
        Calls the writeHeader(byte[]) to write the message header into the gif stego image, then encodes the message to hide using hideByte(byte) byte by byte, then saves the stego gif image using GifSequenceWriter
        Specified by:
        encode in class BaseSteganography
        Parameters:
        message - message to embed in the cover image
        output - stego image with the embedded message
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while creating the stego image.
        CannotEncodeException - if the message is empty or larger than maximum capacity.

      • encode

        public void encode​(java.io.File doc,
                   java.io.File output)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   CannotEncodeException
        Calls the writeHeader(byte[]) to write the file header into the gif stego image, then encodes the file to hide using hideByte(byte) byte by byte, then saves the stego gif image using GifSequenceWriter
        Specified by:
        encode in class BaseSteganography
        Parameters:
        doc - document to embed in the cover image
        output - stego image with the embedded file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while reading the secret file or creating the stego image.
        CannotEncodeException - if the file is empty or larger than maximum capacity.

      • decode

        public void decode​(java.io.File file)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   CannotDecodeException
        Extracts the header from the stego image to create the BaseSteganography.secretInfo field, then decodes the hidden data in the image using revealByte(), then saves the secret file.
        Specified by:
        decode in class BaseSteganography
        Parameters:
        file - destination of the embedded data in the stego image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing hidden data to the file.
        CannotDecodeException - if there is no data embedded in the stego image.

      • embed

        private int embed​(int pixel,
                  char c)
        Embeds one bit into the least significant bit of a pixel.
        Parameters:
        pixel - pixel to embed the bit in
        c - character representation of the bit to hide ('1' or '0')
        Returns:
        the pixel byte with the embedded bit

      • hideByte

        private void hideByte​(byte b)
        Hides one byte into the least significant bit of 8 consecutive pixels using embed(int, char).
        Parameters:
        b - byte to hide

      • revealByte

        private byte revealByte​()
        Reveals one byte embedded into 8 consecutive pixels.
        Returns:
        the hidden byte.

      • increment

        protected void increment​()
        Increments the x, y and z axis position in a GIF89a image.

        Note : i and j represent the position of the pixel in a gif frame, and z the index of the frame currently processed

        Specified by:
        increment in class BaseSteganography

      • reset

        protected void reset​()
        Resets the index back to (0, 0, 0).
        Specified by:
        reset in class BaseSteganography
